FPMinimizable Property

Requires: Base Development System

Class: VI Properties (ActiveX)

Indicates whether the user can minimize the LabVIEW front panel window while the VI runs.

If you load the VI in a subpanel control, this property is read only and always returns a value of FALSE.

This property is similar to the Allow user to minimize window checkbox in the LabVIEW Customize Window Appearance dialog box.

Syntax

object.FPMinimizable

Data Type

Boolean
